about.description: Toolbox is a collection of the Materials Data Facility tools and utilities.
about.summary: Toolbox is a collection of the Materials Data Facility tools and utilities.

name: mdf_toolbox
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mdf_toolbox" %}
{% set version = "0.4.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 98de9722e65c130a6417f57b1c74b71ae9742072ffc390a837f643764af8a94f

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.5
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - globus-nexus-client >=0.2.8
    - globus-sdk >=1.7.0
    - requests >=2.18.4

test:
  imports:
    - mdf_toolbox

about:
  home: https://github.com/materials-data-facility/toolbox
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Toolbox is a collection of the Materials Data Facility tools and utilities.'

  description: |
    Toolbox is a collection of the Materials Data Facility tools and utilities.
  doc_url: https://github.com/materials-data-facility/toolbox
  dev_url: https://github.com/materials-data-facility/toolbox

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
